messages.title: A HUNG PARLIAMENT WOULD MEAN 5 MORE YEARS OF GORDON BROWN
messages.content: Britain needs energy and leadership. The only way to make sure we don’t have 5 more years of Gordon Brown is to vote Conservative.

messages.title: The choice at this election:
messages.content: 5 more years of Gordon Brown or Change with the Conservatives. The Conservatives must win here to stop another 5 years of Gordon Brown.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Gareth is part of team bringing a Conservative MP back to Westmorland General or support our post offices.
Reducing corporation tax, stopping waste of EU bailouts, supporting small businesses, and aiming to create the next generation to stay in farming.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives must win here to stop another 5 years of Gordon Brown.

issues.economy: Reducing corporation tax, stopping waste of EU bailouts, supporting small businesses.
issues.governance: Need to restore public trust in politicians.

images.caption: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM DAVID CAMERON

leaflet.additionalNotes: Gareth lives full-time in Kendal and comes to politics with significant real-world experience.
